entry.title: [UK/EU][PublicCloud] - OpenStack - RabbitMQ upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 5, 07:00 UTC  -  Sep 13, 23:00 UTC

Aug 22, 23:47 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 05/09/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 13/09/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : OpenStack API will be unavailable for 2H during the operation.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for RabbitMQ (Message queue service).
The upgrade will be rolled out following this schedule :
w36 (04/09)

UK1 05/09 19:00 UTC

GRA5 06/09 19:00 UTC

GRA9 07/09 19:00 UTC

w37 (11/09)

GRA7 11/09 19:00 UTC

GRA11 12/09 19:00 UTC

DE1 13/09 19:00 UTC

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Volumes and nodes are still properly deleted.

entry.title: [GRA][Managed Private Registry] - End of life of registries in Harbor version 1.10
entry.content:
Aug 1, 12:23 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Aug 1, 12:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 1, 09:07 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 01/08/2023 12:00 UTC
End time : 01/08/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : All registries in version 1.10 will be shutdown during the maintenance and won't be available from 01/08/2023.
Service improvement : As precised in mail communication campaign sent on May and June, all registries in Harbor version 1.10 will be cut on 01/08.
If you didn't migrated to version 2 yet, please contact our support.

entry.title: [GRA1][Storage] - Block Storage hosts down and read-only data
entry.content:
Jul 29, 10:32 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 28/07/2023 17:20 UTC
End Time : 29/07/2023 10:30 UTC
Root cause : Hardware issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 28, 19:06 UTC
Monitoring - The issue has been identified.
A fix has been implemented. All data is now available.
However, you may experience slower than normal performance as the underlying cluster rebalances.
We are monitoring the situation until all services are operational and performance is back to pre-incident levels.

Jul 28, 17:35 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 28/07/2023 17:20 UTC
Service impact : Multiple hosts are down in multiple racks and as a results to protect data integrity part of the cluster went to fail safe read-only mode
Ongoing actions : We are investigating the cause.
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
